entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning early in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm except 10 cm in areas of heaviest snow. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 25 February 2023
